product_name: The North Face GTD Running Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face GTD Running Shorts offer top-notch comfort throughout your workout with soft polyester fabric and a built-in liner that wicks moisture. Polyester fabric is soft, lightweight and smooth to the touch; mesh panels enhance breathability. Both the liner shorts and the outer fabric wick moisture, dry quickly and offer UPF 30 protection from the sun. FlashDry(TM) fibers in liner shorts dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Drawcord waistband. Carry a small item, such as a debit card or energy gel, in the rear zippered pocket. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD Running Shorts increase visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face GTD Running Shorts offer top-notch comfort throughout your workout with soft polyester fabric and a built-in liner that wicks moisture.
